title: Thousands pack White House grounds for Trump's Easter Egg roll
shortDescription: President Trump is hosting the annual White House Easter Egg Roll after the Vatican announced the death of Pope Francis earlier in the day.

title: House Dems in El Salvador to demand Abrego Garcia's return
shortDescription: Four House Democrats traveled to El Salvador to advocate for the release of Kilmar Abrego Garcia, a Maryland man who was wrongly deported.

title: Trump marks Easter by blasting Biden and 'Radical Left Lunatics'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has long used Easter to taunt his critics - and 2025 was no different with his messages about Joe Biden and the Democrats.

title: Pope Francis, a Trump critic, met with JD Vance on Easter morning
shortDescription: Pope Francis held a private meeting at the Vatican on Sunday morning with Vice President JD Vance, the Vatican said in a statement.

title: GOP senator knocks Kilmar Abrego Garcia deportation
shortDescription: Sen. John Kennedy of Louisiana said the deportation of Abrego Garcia was a clear mistake. But he said it does not reflect Trump's record overall.

title: How to watch the White House Easter egg roll; 30K real eggs to be used
shortDescription: The White House Easter egg roll is set to take place on Monday and for the first time, there are corporate sponsors. Here's how to watch the event.

title: Trump admin asks Supreme Court to resume deportations of Venezuelans
shortDescription: Solicitor General John Sauer urged the Supreme Court to allow the deportation of alleged Venezuelan gang members the justices temporarily blocked.

title: Judge orders transgender passports despite 'irrational' Trump policy
shortDescription: A judge ordered the State Department to provide six transgender and nonbinary people passports after finding 'irrational prejudice' in Trump order.

title: Trump considers ending peace negotiations in Russia's war on Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is frustrated with Russia and Ukraine and could instruct his administration to pull out of peace talks.

title: A new phase begins in Trump's battle with higher education
shortDescription: Colleges have been pushing back against the Trump administration's policies in a mostly quiet way. Then came Harvard's loud defiance.
